medical_history.chief_complaint: Loss of appetite, loss of weight, sleeplessness, and restlessness.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Mr. A started showing symptoms about 10 years prior to the first evaluation, which included periods of restlessness, followed by depression characterized by withdrawal and neglect of personal hygiene. His mother noted he was always 'slow' and had periodic bursts of restlessness when upset.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Diagnosed with moderate mental retardation (IQ of 47) and chronic undifferentiated schizophrenia. History of hospitalizations in state psychiatric hospitals.
medical_history.family_history: His mother reported he was thought to be 'retarded' in the sixth grade. No other specific family health issues mentioned.
medical_history.social_history: Mr. A lived with his elderly mother and had no rehabilitation attempts apart from familial support.
